rationale: The segment reports funding allocation but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The CDC announced an additional $4 million will be sent to the National Center for Farmworker Health to help prevent more workers from getting sick with bird flu.
The CDC announced an additional $4 million will be sent to the National Center for Farmworker Health to help prevent more workers from getting sick with bird flu.
